channel.title: Kyoto on Hello Richie
channel.description: Recent content in Kyoto on Hello Richie

item.title: Gion Matsuri
item.description: Gion Matsuri is known as one of the big three festivals of Kyoto. The festivities actually extend for the entire month and it culminates in a couple parades that go right through the heart of the city and around the historic centre. There were heaps of people who turned out for this enormous parade It’s really feasible to attend all the festivities, and you probably don’t really want to unless you’re a hardcore religious and culture nut.
